ProjectTitle: Profiling of protein depalmitoylation during adipogenesis using activity-based probes
InitialFeedbackHistory:
08/06/2023
Documentation: please avoid the use of google drive but use a KU Leuven supported solution, for example teams or onedrive, will you generate metadata with your analysis? For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Storage/preservation: Storing data on laptops and hard drives is not very secure, please use a KU Leuven supported storage solution, consult the storage guide find the most suitable solution: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en. 
Sharing: please note that this section concerns data underlying publications, not the publications themselves. If there are no factors restricting sharing, why don't you use a data repository to share your data, for example KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) or a disciplinary repository, for more information see www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
